pageContext.claim: “But we're stepping up now. So we have a chance of getting close to $8 billion -- whether it's $8 billion or $2 billion or $1.5 billion, it's going to build a lot of wall. We're getting it done.”
pageContext.analysis: Even if Trump is able to procure $8 billion to fund new wall construction, it would be a drop in the bucket of what would be needed to accomplish his full vision, which expert estimators say could cost at least $25 billion.
